Thelma Elizabeth Bernhardt

  1. Foster Name: Thelma
  2. Foster Family: Peter and Elizabeth Michaely
  3. Location of Family: Exeter, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1897-12-22, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1967-01-13
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Thelma Liet
  11. Spouse Name: John W. Liet
  12. Source: OTR 80 and info 585; How the Orphans Fared by Dorothy Criegh; Homes for Children p 4-5; Nebraska Signal 2 February 1967.
